comments:
After closing an existing project, on reopening, there is a new subdirectory
.metadata created.  LMB on .metadata will cause a java.lang.NullPointerException
if done from the C/C++ Projects view, but no problem if done from the Navigator.

Here is the .log: 

Log: Wed Feb 20 12:30:46 EST 2002
1 org.eclipse.core.resources 4 Unhandled exception caught in event loop.
Log: Wed Feb 20 12:30:46 EST 2002

The problem is that we're trying to open an editor on a directory which you 
shouldn't be able to do.  This was first brought up in defect 9684.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 9684 ***
